html:
2025-0886
2025-12-05ESDCAccessible Canada ActRegulations Amending the Accessible Canada RegulationsRegulations Amending the Accessible Canada Regulations in order to (1) introduce a new part titled “Information and Communication Technologies” (ICT) that sets out the first phase of new requirements for both public and private sector federally regulated entities regarding digital accessibility; (2) set accessibility requirements for three areas of digital technologies that are priorities for persons with disabilities; (3) ensure that federally regulated entities must provide training on digital accessibility fundamentals to their employees who develop, maintain or purchase digital technologies; publish accessibility statements about their web pages, mobile applications and digital documents; and assess the accessibility of certain digital technology products and services they purchase; and (4) exempt from the Regulations, the private sector federally regulated entities with 99 employees or fewer.Registration: SOR/2025-0255 Publication Date: 2025-12-17
subject: Regulations Amending the Accessible Canada Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the Accessible Canada Regulations in order to (1) introduce a new part titled “Information and Communication Technologies” (ICT) that sets out the first phase of new requirements for both public and private sector federally regulated entities regarding digital accessibility; (2) set accessibility requirements for three areas of digital technologies that are priorities for persons with disabilities; (3) ensure that federally regulated entities must provide training on digital accessibility fundamentals to their employees who develop, maintain or purchase digital technologies; publish accessibility statements about their web pages, mobile applications and digital documents; and assess the accessibility of certain digital technology products and services they purchase; and (4) exempt from the Regulations, the private sector federally regulated entities with 99 employees or fewer.
